Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: KR_EDINBURGH
Reviews.Content: stayed night paid 120 euros standard signs renovation walls scuffed bathroom bit dirty expect supposedly quality hotel bed comfy fairly spacious completely devoid character breakfast 10 euro buffet probably aspect hotel location decent stayed hotel close aparthotel sliver

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Stay”
Reviews.Author: Andgreen
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights september found little hotel nice residential location centre location metro fontana nearest stop staff friendly overtly clean huge breakfast happy pastries breads cereals base touring fab city barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Good location and reasonable rates”
Reviews.Author: Eduardo S
Reviews.Content: sightseeing walking distance hotel safe night staff arent friendly walk couple blocks restaurants shops worst hotel internet allow day 30min free access lobby overall

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay in August”
Reviews.Author: infast
Reviews.Content: stay august hotel goes hotel decent placed metro august majority staff bar closed restaurant closed apart poor cold selection breakfast recommend t10 metro ticket tend time 4 5 3 days

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel close to Park Guell”
Reviews.Author: Kasiuleczek
Reviews.Content: stayed nh week hotel little noisy liked localisation hotel close fontana gracia metro stations street noisy didnt window ac closed windows kept noise outside true disadvantage breakfast choice day exactly wait bread hot water waiters didnt manage plates enjoyed stay
